name: Dima Adventure 4
description:
A linear little game with a simple storyline, the passage of which will take an average of 30-40 minutes. Your goal: To get the latest edition of your favorite journal by destroying the monsters, buying and finding potion, going through different biomes and looking for weapons.

I apologize to you. Potions give you mana, which you can spend on the effects that are shown below. 1. Fireball - deals damage to the enemy. 2. Lightning - deals damage over the area. 3. Cross - gives health. 4. Protects against poison. 5. Neutralizes the poison. 6. Bloody sword - gives poison to enemies. Once again I apologize for not describing.
